## ⚠️ This Repository Does Not Accept Contributions

**LFM is a read-only research repository** published under **CC BY-NC-ND 4.0 (NoDerivatives)**.

### Why is this closed?
This repository serves as:
- A defensive publication establishing prior art
- An archival record linked to DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.17478758
- A reference implementation for published research

### What if I found a bug or have questions?
Please email: **latticefieldmediumresearch@gmail.com**

### Can I fork or modify this code?
**No.** The CC BY-NC-ND 4.0 license prohibits derivative works. See [LICENSE](../LICENSE) for details.

### Commercial licensing?
Contact latticefieldmediumresearch@gmail.com with formal inquiry.

---

**This issue/PR will be closed automatically.**
